Plot: Searching for a cure to Alzheimer's disease a group of scientists on an isolated research facility become the bait as a trio of intelligent sharks fight back.
Title: Deep Blue Sea
Writer: Duncan Kennedy, Donna Powers, Wayne Powers
Actors: Thomas Jane, Saffron Burrows, Samuel L. Jackson, Jacqueline McKenzie
tomatoConsensus: Aside from a few thrills, Deep Blue Sea is unoriginal and unintelligent.
